title: Naturall philosophy, or, A description of the world, namely, of angels, of man, of the heauens, of the ayre, of the earth, of the water and of the creatures in the whole world.
author: Scribonius, Wilhelm Adolf, fl. 1576-1583.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by I.D. for Iohn Bellamie, and are to be sould at the south entrance of the Royall Exchange,
